reviews.review: lo que me intereso del juego es su modalidades y sus controles y sus lista de severs amplias

Only 1,1 hrs on record now, since recently bought it, but prolly have about 2k+ hours a couple of years back.

Nothing much to say, tried it quickly the other day:

- M4a1s super op, still had 30 bullets

- The shotgun destroyed

- Office is everyone's favorite map

- Assault's glitches here are on csgo too

- bots here are actually better than players

- no skins

- no gloves

- good ole css

( First cs game, never played 1.6 and before; so css's mah first love <3 )
CS:S Is realesed in 2004,and people still playing it.That's impressive! Servers are fun,players are not kinda salt. Sadly it doesn't have the lobbys. Still the game is great 8/10 my rate.

Granted I played CS:GO before any other Counterstrike game,

this one is the best Counterstrike ever.  I have 1,300 hours in CS:GO but this one seems like more skill is needed to play it.  I got it also in the valve complete pack for $15 dollars since it was on sale, so I practically got it for free.  Very nice game to remaster your aim in!

Игра времён, познакомился с КС благодаря ей в компьютерном зале. Люблю всем сердцем. Всем советую.

为曾经小学时代的梦想而发文
从cs1.6到css再到csgo，历经12年我们的梦想从未改变

NOWA WERSJA WIODĄCEJ SIECIOWEJ GRY AKCJI 
Counter-Strike: Source łączy dynamiczną akcję znaną z Counter-Strike i zaawansowaną technologię Source™. Dzięki znakomitym efektom graficznym, nowym dźwiękom i ulepszonemu modelowi fizyki, Counter-Strike: Source to obowiązkowa pozycja dla wszystkich fanów gier akcji.

MON AVIS SUR CE JEU :

-EXCELLENT JEU , BONNE COMMUNAUTE , BEAUCOUPS DE MODS DIVERS , WORKSHOP BIENSUR ! LE MUST CEST VRAIMENT LES MODS PARCEQUE APRES 600 HEURES DE JEUX SUR CSS J'EN DECOUVRE ENCORE PLUS !

-PLUS FACIL A MANIER QUE CSGO ET PLUS AGREABLE A JOUER ! LES ARMES SONT CUSTOMISABLES AINSI SI VOUS VOULEZ ACHETER CSGO SEULEMENT POUR CES SKINS ET ARMES , VOUS AVEZ LA POSSIBILITE DAVOIR EXACTEMENT LES ARMES DE CSGO SUR CSS .

N'ESITEZ VRAIMENT PAS C REELEMENT BIEN
